name: Clerk hot Tale
description:
Clerk hot Tale is a visual novel in which the player goes through all the circles of bureaucratic hell, accompanied by an adorable female official.
The gameplay contains a narrative part, in which you can observe the main story, as well as an attentive quest in the genre of Spot the Difference.
Music from the great Kotovsky will help you immerse yourself in the atmosphere of the game.
Press the clothes hanger button to undress the girl.
